title:
Hello,

I have heard many loud, shaking noises lately. No one seems to know what They are. any help?
text:
This previous post at MyReporter.com should answer your question, as
much as it is possible to answer it:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1275



And here's a link to a database where you enter when and where you
heard the booms:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101119/ARTICLES/101119552
